Text: Can some one tell me why I can not see the map when I look in my garmin maps in nuvi 660?

have you copied the Garmin folder to your sd-card?

not just the img inside the folder

Yes I did, my SD card is noname, inside is a garmin folder and there inside is the img, When I go inside the maps in my nuvi 660 I can see only the old v9 map not marked, but when I want to navigate I see roads and everything but do not know if these are from the v9 map or the new one 2013

in Map Info you should be able to see both maps listed and be able to check which one you want to use

http://www.garmin.com/garmin/cms/site/us/mapinfo/
Yes thats what I mean, I can not se the new map there, I can only see only the old map and its unchecked

weird ... is the SD-card too big for your Garmin? ie can it read that size?

Some older can only read up to 2 GB, not 4GB cards

checked Nuvi 660 can handle up to 16 GB

is it formatted in FAT32 then? cause if it´s using NTFS the 660 can´t read it

its FAT32 and my garmin 660 had the older 2012 maps in a 4Gb card with no problem, I use the same card now, I tried to navigate yesterday but nothing works so I had to use older maps v9 in nuvi it self

then I´m clueless :/

unlocked map in a Garmin folder should work straight away

helloboy44 , try when you are on the map , to zoom in on the map , on the + , push many times on the + , and then you can see the road where you stay , I have the same problem on my Nuvi 750 , when I start it the first time , after install this update . Have a nice day
